title: Blind Passion
description:
From the day she was born, Soonok's greedy father had only one plan for his daughter - to make her the next queen of the Joseon Dynasty, even if that meant marrying her off to the unsavory King. As royal factions scheme in the shadows for the throne, Soonok and her childhood friend Hyang weave through a palace of greed, deceit, and lust hoping to survive together the troubles that await them. Will Soonok and Hyang's love remain true? Or will the palace's blood-stained secrets tear them apart?

[url=https://www.tappytoon.com/series/reignofdesire/1]R15 version[/url]
